title: Data Structures and Algorithms
subject: Computer Science
description: Comprehensive guide to fundamental data structures and algorithms, including arrays, linked lists, trees, graphs, sorting algorithms, and search techniques with implementation examples in Java.
author: Robert Martin

title: Database Systems Concepts
subject: Computer Science
description: In-depth exploration of database theory and implementation covering relational algebra, SQL, transaction processing, concurrency control, recovery techniques, and database design principles.
author: Jennifer Lee

title: Python Programming for Beginners
subject: Computer Science
description: Friendly introduction to Python programming language for complete beginners, with hands-on exercises and projects covering variables, loops, functions, file I/O, and basic data structures.
author: Thomas Anderson

title: Software Engineering Principles
subject: Computer Science
description: Best practices for software design and development including requirements engineering, design patterns, testing methodologies, project management, and continuous integration/delivery workflows.
author: Patricia Moore

title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
subject: Computer Science
description: Introduction to machine learning algorithms and applications, covering supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, decision trees, support vector machines, and practical implementation with Python libraries.
author: Richard Wong

title: Web Development with JavaScript
subject: Computer Science
description: Modern JavaScript techniques for web development, including ES6+ features, DOM manipulation, asynchronous programming, frontend frameworks (React, Vue), and server-side JavaScript with Node.js.
author: Samantha Green
